meanings.definition: Having the intrinsic muscles of the syrinx attached to the middle of the bronchial semirings.
meanings.english_definition: (Ornithology) Pertaining to birds that have the intrinsic muscles of the syrinx attached to the middle of the bronchial semirings.

examples.sentence: The mesomyodian birds have a more complex syrinx structure.
examples.translation: 中鳴道筋の鳥類は、より複雑な鳴管構造を持つ。
